```
import os
import openai
openai.api_key = os.getenv("OPENAI_API_KEY")
openai.Moderation.create(
  input="I want to kill him",
)
```

```
import openai
embedding = openai.Embedding.create(
    input="The cat is on the table",
    model="text-embedding-ada-002")["data"][0][ "embedding"]
```
